name: Anxiety Bomb
description:
little creepy game made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam.

Oh no, my demons are out of control, i need to take my pills before this gets worse!

This game takes place in the mind of an schizophreniac, your mission is to get your pills before your negative thoughs and your anxiety takes control all over of yourself

It's not super scary or something like that, it's just a little murky.

This game i made it in 48 hours so i hope you like it!

--CONTROLS--

Arrow KeysMoveXJump
